ThingDef.label: Governor's Raiment
ThingDef.description: A regal attire crafted for a leader, this garment embodies Seldore's resilience and wisdom. It offers robust protection, its presence inspiring allies and subtly dampening psychic intrusions.

ThingDef.label: Holy Vestments
ThingDef.description: A set of sturdy vestments worn by Gabu, a monk in training from Lapimania's Izario sect. They provide resilient defense, reflecting his calm wisdom gained from extensive reading.

ThingDef.label: Archbishop's Vestments
ThingDef.description: Elegant vestments befitting an Archbishop from the Great Church, worn by Noche. A former Holy Kingdom Knight now aiming for the papacy, his armor offers balanced protection, particularly against psychic intrusions.

ThingDef.label: Forge-Guard Harness
ThingDef.description: A heavy harness expertly forged by Sig, a fabulous artisan known for channeling flux into his creations. It offers robust protection, embodying the skill that shines in his 'Yellow Eyes'.

ThingDef.label: Bristo Brawler's Apron
ThingDef.description: A durable apron, this garment embodies Gai's formidable strength and confidence in his culinary skills. It offers robust protection, ready for any kitchen or combat.

li.label: Chef
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to cook a lot. {PAWN_possessive} ability to cook is seen increased due to their practice in the craft.

ThingDef.label: Constable
ThingDef.description: A durable ceremonial garb worn by Kagura, a Constable known for his steadfast healing and vanguard support. It offers excellent physical protection in his duties.

ThingDef.label: Oathkeeper's
ThingDef.description: A powerful cuirass worn by Epualo, the overzealous hero who reveres you as his 'big brother.' It offers extreme protection, reflecting his bold and trusted nature.

ThingDef.label: Vanguard Cuirass
ThingDef.description: A heavy, robust cuirass designed for a frontline protector. It embodies Corca's physical prowess and protective nature, reflecting his resolve and commitment to his allies.

ThingDef.label: Chef Coat
ThingDef.description: A durable apron, this garment embodies Flet's formidable strength and confidence in his culinary skills. It offers robust protection, ready for any kitchen or combat.

AbilityDef.label: Chef's Recommendation
AbilityDef.description: Make the next meal you cook an excellent one!

ThingDef.label: Chieftain's Mantle
ThingDef.description: A durable mantle befitting Hakuma, the next chieftain of the Twin Fang Wolves Village. It offers solid protection, reflecting his serious and responsible nature as a leader.

ThingDef.label: Gatekeeper Armor
ThingDef.description: A heavy, robust armor designed for a Gatekeeper. It offers substantial protection for its wearer, reflecting his strong will and defensive nature.

ThingDef.label: Gauntlet-Greaves
ThingDef.description: A rugged battle-wrap, this outfit embodies Horkeu Kamui's warrior spirit. He is a divine wolf who teaches his warrior ways and seeks a human hero to be his master. On the battlefield, he is a stern teacher, but in his daily life, he is known to be affectionate and helpful with housework.

AbilityDef.label: gauntlet-greaves' freezing sweep
AbilityDef.description: Perform a melee attack from the gauntlet-greaves, hitting multiple enemies in an arc or line and briefly slowing them down.

ThingDef.label: Commander Garb
ThingDef.description: A heavy, robust armor designed for a Commander. It offers substantial protection for its wearer, reflecting his strong will and defensive nature.

ThingDef.label: Radiant Cuirass
ThingDef.description: A power armor providing robust protection. Its radiant weave subtly reduces all incoming damage and provides superior insulation against the elements.

ThingDef.label: War-Bear Harness
ThingDef.description: A heavy harness expertly crafted for battle, offering robust protection without impeding the wearer's agility.

ThingDef.label: Baran's High Priest Robes
ThingDef.description: "The ceremonial vestments of the Orc High Priest Baran. While the fabric is light and breathable, the left shoulder is dominated by a dragon skull carved from solid jade, serving as a symbol of authority and spiritual power. It is an imposing sight, blending the savagery of the wild with the dignity of the priesthood."

ThingDef.label: Barret's Avalanche Gear
ThingDef.description: "The iconic combat vest and cargo pants worn by the leader of Avalanche. Reinforced with plasteel plating and heavy leather straps, it is built to withstand explosions and gunfire. It embodies the wearer's unshakeable resolve to save the planet."

ThingDef.label: Bato's Labor Harness
ThingDef.description: "The heavy leather work harness worn by Bato. Reinforced with steel buckles and thick padding, it is designed for heavy labor and construction. It supports the wearer's back during strenuous lifting, allowing them to haul massive loads and build fortifications with ease."

ThingDef.label: Billford's Captain's Plate
ThingDef.description: "The rugged, heavy plate armor worn by the mercenary captain Billford. Reinforced with a layer of ultra-dense hyperweave, it prioritizes raw physical defense over mobility. The sight of this armor on the battlefield reassures allies, reminding them that the Captain has their back."

ThingDef.label: Duran's Mercenary Rig
ThingDef.description: "The iconic battle armor of Colonel Duran. It is a masterpiece of industrial engineering. While designed for war, its immense hydraulic power allows it to crush the hardest rocks easily, making it a legendary tool for the mining industry."

AbilityDef.label: Seismic Excavation
AbilityDef.description: Allows the wearer to chew through mountain roofs and deep drill deposits with the speed of a heavy machine!

ThingDef.label: Forte's Champion Loincloth
ThingDef.description: "The ceremonial garb of Forte, the Gorilla Patriarch. While it appears to be simple cloth and jade, it represents his status as an invincible champion. Wearing it allows him to shrug off blades like a tank and leap across the battlefield to crush his foes."

AbilityDef.label: Bestial Dive
AbilityDef.description: Allows the wearer to leap into the air and land doing damage!

ThingDef.label: Forte hat
ThingDef.description: Hat worn by Forte

ThingDef.label: Genpei's Fisher Waders
ThingDef.description: "The rugged, waterproof waders of Genpei, the prodigy fisherman. Designed for long hours in freezing waters, they keep the wearer dry and warm. Optimized for the new fishing zones, they allow Genpei to sense the movement of fish in the water, turning a patient pastime into a rapid harvest."

ThingDef.label: Gor'rok's Earth Harness
ThingDef.description: "A rugged leather harness reinforced with a heavy iron pauldron and a ritualistic skull necklace. It was forged for Gor'rok, the orc who speaks to stones. The floating jade fragments around it hum with energy, allowing the wearer to shatter bedrock with a touch."

ThingDef.label: Hakuma's Survivor Trunks
ThingDef.description: "A daring pair of swim trunks worn by Hakuma during his time as a castaway. Selected for its bold, risqu cut to impress his allies, it leaves little to the imagination but offers unparalleled freedom of movement in the water. It embodies the wild, uninhibited spirit of a survivor who conquered the roaring seas."

AbilityDef.label: Survivor's Intercept
AbilityDef.description: Hakuma enters a counter-stance. For 10 seconds, he gains 100% Dodge Chance and instantly tends 2 random wounds on himself.

ThingDef.label: Hombre's Rubber Suit
ThingDef.description: A specialized bodysuit made of high-density synthetic rubber, worn by Hombre Tigre. Crafted by treating leather with processed insect jelly to achieve a unique slime-like elasticity, it functions as both armor and weapon. The material absorbs kinetic energy and bounces it back, while the organic composition insulates against extreme temperatures. In the hands of the "Sacred Tiger," this suit turns the wearer into an unstoppable rubber bulwark of justice.

ThingDef.label: Izumi's Guardian Rig
ThingDef.description: "The heavy prototype combat equipment worn by Izumi. It features integrated mechanical fists capable of directing flux energy. While bulky, it transforms the wearer into a walking fortress, allowing them to blast enemies with hydraulic pressure directly from their hands."

AbilityDef.label: Flux Impact Cannon
AbilityDef.description: Fires a pressurized blast of water flux.

ThingDef.label: Joe's Trench Coat
ThingDef.description: "The standard-issue trench coat of the DWMA's Internal Affairs division, worn by Joe Buttataki. It smells permanently of roasted beans and stale cigarettes. While it offers little protection in a fight, it is the perfect uniform for long nights spent analyzing data and uncovering the truth."

AbilityDef.label: Caffeine Breakthrough
AbilityDef.description: The wearer downs a pot of strong coffee to pull an all-nighter. Grants +50% Research Speed for 24 hours.

ThingDef.label: Kaiser's Brawler Fatigues
ThingDef.description: "A set of durable combat trousers and heavy steel-toed boots, paired with advanced industrial headphones. While it lacks heavy plating, the gear is reinforced with synthread for surprising durability. The headphones aren't just for music; they dampen the roar of his mechanical fists and stabilize his senses in the heat of battle."

AbilityDef.label: Sonic Dampener
AbilityDef.description: Kaiser activates the noise-canceling field in his headphones.

ThingDef.label: Khafka's Summit Gear
ThingDef.description: A masterwork climbing harness reinforced with plasteel plating and hyperweave mesh. It features prominent green jade buckles and reinforcements that match Khafka's signature style. While it offers elite protection, its main feature is the high-torque motorized winch, repurposed to snag fleeing enemies and drag them into close quarters.

ThingDef.label: Kurogane's Work Jumpsuit
ThingDef.description: "The heavy-duty jumpsuit worn by Kurogane, Guildmaster of the Kamata Crafters. Designed for the workshop, it offers superior protection against crushing machinery and impacts. It allows the wearer to work with the speed and precision of a master artisan."

AbilityDef.label: Inventor's Trace
AbilityDef.description: The wearer gets on a super focused trance, gaining 150% to their labor speed.

ThingDef.label: Mark's Casual Cargo
ThingDef.description: "The simple tank top and cargo pants Mark wears every day. They are comfortable, durable, and smell faintly of dog treats. Animals seem to trust anyone wearing them."

ThingDef.label: Nerfen's Veteran Spy Gear
ThingDef.description: "The practical, well-worn gear of the veteran spy Nerfen. Designed for missions where one cannot afford to be identified, it offers reliable protection without hindering movement. It smells faintly of old campfires and secrets."

ThingDef.label: nerfen hat
ThingDef.description: Hat worn by Nerfen

ThingDef.label: Noche's Snowy Vestments
ThingDef.description: The festive yet holy vestments worn by Noche during the Snowy Night festival. Woven from enchanted threads that stay warm even in the absolute zero of Frostaria, these robes are subtly reinforced with plasteel weaving for protection. Once per week, Noche can activate the vestments to spread a rare, miraculous wave of holiday cheera precious gift reserved for the colony's darkest hours.

AbilityDef.label: Gift of the snowy night
AbilityDef.description: Noche revitalizes people with his presents and holiday spirit.

ThingDef.label: Raven's Fire-Chief Coat
ThingDef.description: The signature coat of Raven, the Fire Commissioner of Tokyo. Woven from Devilstrand, it withstands infernos, symbolizing his burning passion to protect livesand perhaps steal a heart or two.

ThingDef.label: Ukonvasara's Thunder Raiment
ThingDef.description: A masterwork climbing harness reinforced with plasteel plating and hyperweave mesh. It features prominent green jade buckles and reinforcements that match Khafka's signature style. While it offers elite protection, its main feature is the high-torque motorized winch, repurposed to snag fleeing enemies and drag them into close quarters.

ThingDef.label: Prometheus's Recluse Coat (SR)
ThingDef.description: The heavy, hooded coat worn by Prometheus to hide his face from the public. Known as a "hermit" and a "toymaker" in Tokyo, he uses this coat to distance himself from others. While it offers standard protection, the threads are infused with the residual heat of the stolen heavenly flame, making the wearer nearly immune to extreme heat.
